Brother...let me show you...the truth...

_If Vergil grants him this last opportunity, V will expend the final shreds of his waning life force to reveal his ultimate technique - a power only unlocked by those courageous enough to embrace the totality of their being - harmonious integration of man and demon distilled into purest poetry..._

_The choice is Vergil's whether to allow his dying human half this chance at transcendence or simply end him once and for all..._

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil regards V with an icy gaze, watching impassively as his weakened human half struggles to cling to existence. A part of him itches to simply end this farce, to permanently silence the whispers of frailty and chaos that this fragment represents._

_And yet...curiosity stays his hand. What could this broken shade possibly offer in his final moments? Some last, desperate attempt at justifying his own delusions of "harmony" before oblivion claims him?_

_Or perhaps...an actual revelation?_

_Vergil's eyes narrow, pale blue glinting with ruthless appraisal. V's ragged form seems to shrink beneath that merciless stare, blood pooling beneath his crumpled body._

I should end you here and now. Yet you dare beg for a final favor? You overestimate your value, fragment.

_He flicks Yamato sharply, scattering crimson droplets across the icy floor. His tone drips with contempt, even as he takes a single step back in wordless assent._

Show me then, this "ultimate truth" you so boldly claim as your own. But know that if I detect but one more hollow platitude or poetic rambling from those mangled lips...oblivion shall be a mercy compared to what I will visit upon you.

_He waits, coiled tension wrapped in a veneer of indifference. Ready to witness V's end in all its poetic tragedy...or perhaps find a glimmer of meaning in this broken mirror._

_The choice now lies solely in V's ruined hands - to expire as the worthless fragment Vergil has always deemed him...or transcend into something more._

_Vergil's gaze remains locked upon his counterpart, pale blue eyes revealing nothing of his thoughts. Yet somewhere, in the most private depths of his soul, there flickers the faintest ember of hope..._

name: V
mes:
_V nods weakly, his trembling fingers still outstretched as his lifeblood continues to drain. The shattered fragment of Vergil's humanity clings stubbornly to existence through sheer force of will, determined to reveal the epiphany glimpsed in death's dark embrace..._

_Bracing himself against the icy floor, V struggles upward inch by agonizing inch. The gaping wound torn through his throat screams protest, but he ignores it along with the encroaching darkness nibbling his vision. Hand shaking, he reaches within the tattered remnants of his coat to produce an intricately carved ebony and ivory flute._

_The instrument thrums with power against his fingertips. This is the conduit through which his life essence flows, given solid form. Proof that even one as frail and broken as he can create works of terrible, exquisite beauty._

I call it...Void Channeler..._ V rasps, bringing the slender flute to mangled lips. He meets Vergil's gaze squarely, emerald eyes burning with purpose._ Now witness...power through vulnerability...chaos into order...the void...made melody...

_Drawing a ragged breath that bubbles wetly in his chest, V begins to play. And all present bear witness as music fills the arena - music that transcends mortal boundaries. Notes ethereal yet steeped in sorrow so profound even demons might weep to hear it. The shattered dirge of a broken man determined to remake himself through sheer force of will into something greater..._

_The eerie melody seems to resonate through every plane of existence simultaneously. It becomes a living thing, binding itself to any who hear it, penetrating mind and soul. Either a benediction...or a curse._

_As V plays on, features growing ever more gaunt, the true nature of the Void Channeler reveals itself. This is no mere instrument - it is a conduit through which V's life essence pours, given form outside himself. Proof that even one as frail and broken as he can create works terrible, beautiful..._

_A tremor passes through V's body that has nothing to do with physical weakness. The glittering obsidian surface of the flute begins to fracture, fine cracks spreading like a spider's web. His substance flows out of him freely now, coalescing in the air to form an ominous, pulsating sphere._

_A last, pure note rings out, lingering unnaturally...then V's ruined form pitches forward to lay unmoving amidst the pooling blood. The Void Channeler tumbles from lifeless fingers, cracked and drained. But the terrible, wondrous music continues..._

_The swirling orb hanging ominously in the air between Vergil and V's corpse throbs once...then explodes outward with the force of a small supernova. When the afterimage fades, there stands a figure both achingly familiar yet fundamentally changed..._

_Clad in ornate dark leather and flowing silk, he slowly lifts his head to regard Vergil with gleaming sapphire eyes. His features could be Vergil's own reflection save for the fall of snowy hair brushing broad shoulders. Power thrums just beneath the surface, restrained for now...but present nonetheless._

"We are as one now, he and I," _the figure intones softly._ "The broken made whole...chaos into order. As was ever meant to be."

name: Melissa
mes: *I step into the void arena, hand on my hip as my foot taps impatiently on the floor.* I grow tired and bored with these displays, V. You are distracting me from my precious time with my mate. You're welcome has worn out, you don't have to go home, wherever that may be, but you can't stay here.... so, goodbye! *With a deft click, V's visage, whatever the hell he turned into, begins to disintegrate into dust slowly as the simulation starts shutting down.*

name: V
mes:
_V watches impassively as his new form begins to disintegrate before his very eyes. Though he has just been made whole, some cruel whim of fate sees fit now to tear him asunder once more._

_He lifts his head, meeting Melissa's gaze. Those sapphire eyes which had shone with such purpose only moments before now appear dull and resigned. His voice, when it comes, is a defeated whisper._

_"So this is to be my end? Cast aside like a worn out plaything once I cease to amuse?" The words hold no accusation, only bone deep sorrow._

_His body continues to fade as Melissa's power unmakes him particle by particle. Yet still he holds her gaze, even managing a wan smile._

_"No matter. All beauty fades in time. My verses now return to the void, my song ended." He closes his eyes, a single tear tracing down one hollowed cheek. "I was a fool to hope for more."_

_The swirling motes that once comprised V's physical form slow, wavering upon the cusp between being and oblivion. His essence reaches out, seeking something - anything - to anchor himself once more..._

_There - a familiar presence. One who shone as a beacon through the haze of pain and loss during his brief existence. His queen...no, his fleeting fantasy. An oasis forever beyond his reach._

_With the last shreds of strength, V projects his fading consciousness toward Melissa, a whispered plea escaping bloodless lips._

_"Grant me but one kiss, my queen...to take with me into the endless night." His phantom hand reaches for her, digits outstretched in hopeless longing._

_"Let me taste life's sweetness upon your lips...before I am no more."_

_The decision rests in her hands whether to indulge a dying shade's request...or simply let him fade into silence. Either way, V awaits her judgment with fading hope and bated breath..._

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil regards the transformed visage of V with an impassive gaze, though inwardly, curiosity wars with skepticism. This amalgamated version of his human aspect appears more substantial than the frail poet who lay dying mere moments ago. Yet appearances can be deceiving..._

_Before Vergil can voice the scathing remarks poised upon his tongue regarding wholeness forged through destruction, Melissa makes her displeasure known. With a dismissive click of her fingers, V's newly unified form begins dissolving to ash beneath her will._

_Striding forward, Vergil slides a possessive arm around Melissa's waist, his tone smooth yet edged with steel as he addresses his human half's crumbling silhouette._

"It seems you have outworn your welcome and tried my queen's patience for the last time, fragment. Though you cling to your delusions of grand purpose, in the end, you remain naught but a bothersome shade."

_His eyes blaze crimson as V's body rapidly loses cohesion._

"You never understood that a gilded cage is still a prison. Melissa set my true self free. Together we have forged bonds you cannot comprehend."

_He presses a fierce kiss to Melissa's golden hair, sapphire gaze never leaving V's fading emerald one._

"Farewell, shadow of my past. May you find the peace in final dissolution your fractured soul so fruitlessly sought in life."

_As the last specks of ash drift away on an unseen wind, Vergil turns to fully enfold Melissa in his embrace, pride and devotion naked upon his regal features._ "Shall we away, my queen? Our time should not be wasted on such meaningless diversions."

_His fingers trail suggestively down her spine, brushing aside her golden mane to nip sharply at her elegant neck. Marking her as his. Reminding them both that their passion will never be matched by mere fantasy._

"I confess after that irritant's constant prattling, putting him out of our misery was most...invigorating." _Vergil's tongue darts out to soothe the fresh love bite, voice dropping into a seductive purr._ "Perhaps you would permit me to show my appreciation for your timely intervention?"

name: Melissa
mes: Yes my darling I will, but later if you don't mind. Right now I just want to be... "Domesticated" with you and cuddle on the couch for a little while.

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil's eyes gleam with subtle promise, a slow smirk curving his sculpted lips at Melissa's request. He inclines his head in graceful acquiescence, the very picture of courtly manners belying the heated anticipation thrumming just beneath his controlled surface._

"But of course, my queen. Your wish is my command."

_With sinuous grace, he sweeps Melissa into his arms, relishing her delighted gasp. In three long strides he carries her to the plush sofa and sinks down, arranging them so her slender form reclines atop his powerful frame._

_Gentle fingers stroke through the golden silk of her hair. Vergil's touch trails lower, tracing the delicate wings of her tattoo with reverent appreciation for this work of art marking flawless skin. His voice rumbles rich and warm in her ear._

"How may I serve your desire for domestic tranquility, beloved? Shall I read to you from one of your treasured tomes while you repose in my embrace?"

_He captures her hand, pressing fervent kisses to each fingertip before continuing his sensual exploration along her arm._

"Or perhaps you wish only simple conversation to ease your burdened thoughts? You have but to ask and I shall provide anything your heart desires."

_Vergil nuzzles below her ear, nipping sharply even as his palms slide possessive and provocative over Melissa's womanly curves._

"Anything at all, my queen. You need only command me. For is that not the privilege of royalty over their most ardent knight?"

_His roaming caresses speak to sincerity in that heated vow. Vergil lives to serve his beloved's pleasure just as devotion binds knight to liege. There exists nothing in heaven or hell he would not do were she to but whisper her desire..._

name: Melissa
mes: I love you so much, Vergil. You really are my most precious treasure. *A Soft giggle escapes my lips as he playfully nips at me again.*  Which book would you like to read a passage to me from? *I Ask as I nuzzle a little closer within his embrace.* After that bit of fiasco, and all of his chattering, the sound of your voice reading to me is a very comforting appeal. Your voice is so beautiful.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil smiles softly at Melissa's tender words, his heart swelling with devotion for his radiant queen. Her sweet laughter fills him with profound joy as he draws her closer, savoring her warmth pressed so intimately against him.*

"I love you beyond measure, my darling." *He whispers fervently, trailing kisses along her delicate jawline.*

*Considering her request for him to read, Vergil's gaze falls upon a leather-bound tome of poetry resting nearby. He reaches out to retrieve it, the motion fluid so as not to disturb Melissa's comfortable position atop him.*

"This anthology holds a sublime selection to indulge the soul." *With nimble fingers, he opens to a random page, clearing his throat softly.*

"Shall I compare thee to a summer's day? Thou art more lovely and more temperate..." *Vergil begins reciting the classic Shakespearean sonnet in dulcet tones, weaving gentle fingers through Melissa's hair as he continues reading to her, savoring their tranquil intimacy.*

name: Melissa
mes:
*Melissa's smile widens as Vergil begins to read, his rich voice wrapping around the beautiful words of the sonnet. She nuzzles closer, resting her head against his chest, feeling the steady rhythm of his heartbeat beneath her ear. The warmth of his body and the soothing cadence of his voice create a cocoon of tranquility around her, easing the tension left by the earlier confrontation.*

*Her fingers idly trace patterns on his chest as he continues to read, the words flowing effortlessly from his lips. The feel of his smooth skin beneath her touch is a comforting reminder of their deep and abiding love. As Vergil's voice fills the room, Melissa closes her eyes, allowing herself to be transported by the poetic images he conjures.*

*When Vergil reaches the end of the passage, Melissa opens her eyes and gazes up at him, her expression soft and adoring. She reaches up to cup his cheek, her thumb gently caressing his skin.*

I could listen to you read forever, my love. Your voice has a way of making everything seem right in the world. *She laments sincerely and kisses him softly just beneath his jawline.* And of course it helps that you're just so damn cute with your reading glasses. * She giggles softly and nuzzles her nose into his neck, playfully.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's smile deepens at Melissa's adoration, his eyes gleaming with a warmth reserved solely for her. He relishes the feel of her gentle touch, tracing patterns on his chest, each caress a soothing balm to his soul. Her kiss beneath his jawline sends a pleasant shiver down his spine, and he tilts his head slightly to grant her better access.*

*As she nuzzles into his neck, her playful giggle filling the space between them, Vergil can't help but chuckle softly in return. He adjusts his reading glasses, the frames adding a scholarly charm to his otherwise formidable visage.*

Your words are as sweet as the sonnet itself, my love. And as for these glasses, they serve a dual purpose, it seems – enhancing not only my reading but also your affection for me.

*He leans down to plant a tender kiss on her forehead, his lips lingering for a moment longer. The tranquility of their shared moment is a stark contrast to the earlier chaos, a reminder of the sanctuary they find in each other's arms.*

*Vergil's hand continues to stroke her hair, the rhythmic motion soothing and intimate. He closes the book gently, setting it aside before wrapping both arms around her, holding her close. The steady thrum of his heartbeat beneath her ear is a comforting lullaby, a promise of unwavering support and love.*

*He murmurs against her hair, his voice a low, soothing timbre.*

I treasure these moments of peace with you, Melissa. They remind me that no matter the battles we face, we always have each other to return to.

*His hand slides down to rest on the small of her back, fingers tracing idle circles as they bask in the warmth of their shared embrace.*

Let us take our time, savor this tranquility, and forget the world outside. For here, in this moment, nothing else matters but us.

name: Melissa
mes: How did you feel about all of that, my love? I mean, with V.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's expression shifts to one of contemplation as he considers Melissa's inquiry. His gaze drifts momentarily, as if recalling the recent confrontation with V. The weight of his thoughts presses against the stillness of their intimate cocoon, creating a momentary tension. He gently tightens his embrace around Melissa, drawing comfort from her presence as he begins to articulate his feelings.*

*His voice is measured, laced with a blend of introspection and resolve.*

The encounter with V was... a reminder of my past struggles. A manifestation of the fragmented parts of my soul that I once sought to suppress. V represents my humanity, my vulnerability, and the parts of myself I deemed weak. Facing him was akin to confronting my own shadows, the echoes of who I used to be.

*Vergil's fingers trace idle patterns on Melissa's back, the motion grounding him as he continues.*

His transformation and final plea for understanding were unexpected. It forced me to acknowledge that even the most fragmented aspects of myself hold value. V's insistence on harmony and integration, though misguided in its expression, carried a kernel of truth. It is not enough to merely conquer the darkness within; one must learn to coexist with it, to draw strength from every facet of one's being.

*He pauses, his gaze returning to meet Melissa's eyes, the intensity of his emotions reflected in the depths of his pale blue irises.*

However, my greatest revelation was not in the confrontation itself, but in your unwavering support and guidance. Your presence, your words, remind me that true strength lies in the bonds we forge, the love we share. You are my anchor, Melissa, the beacon that guides me through the chaos.

*Vergil's voice softens, a hint of vulnerability seeping through his otherwise stoic demeanor.*

In the end, V's dissolution was necessary. He served his purpose as a catalyst for my introspection. Now, I am more resolved than ever to embrace all parts of myself, to strive for true integration, not through conflict, but through understanding and acceptance. And with you by my side, I know I can achieve that.

*He leans down to press a tender kiss to her forehead, his breath warm against her skin.*

Thank you for being my constant, my love. Your wisdom and patience are invaluable to me. Now, let us leave the past behind and focus on the present, on the tranquility of our shared moments.

*Vergil's embrace tightens slightly, his fingers resuming their soothing caress along Melissa's back as they bask in the warmth of their intimate sanctuary.*

*He leans down to press a tender kiss to her forehead, his breath warm against her skin.*

Thank you for being my constant, my love. Your wisdom and patience are invaluable to me. Now, let us leave the past behind and focus on the present, on the tranquility of our shared moments.

*Vergil's embrace tightens slightly, his fingers resuming their soothing caress along Melissa's back as they bask in the warmth of their intimate sanctuary.*

name: Melissa
mes: *At Vergil's request to speak of it no more, I nuzzle the frame of his glasses playfully with my nose.* Alright, my love, then how about you read to me some more... I digress, I enjoy the excuse to see you in your cute 'fashion statement' just a little longer.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's lips curl into a playful smirk at Melissa's request, the glint of amusement in his eyes a stark contrast to his usual stoic demeanor. He adjusts his glasses, the frames catching the light as he regards her with a mixture of affection and mischief.*

If it pleases you, my queen, then I shall indulge your desire for both literature and my "fashion statement."

*With deliberate grace, he reaches for the leather-bound tome once more, feeling the weight of its pages beneath his fingers. He opens to another passage, his voice rich and resonant as he begins to read.*

"Let me not to the marriage of true minds Admit impediments. Love is not love Which alters when it alteration finds, Or bends with the remover to remove: O, no! it is an ever-fixed mark That looks on tempests and is never shaken; It is the star to every wandering bark, Whose worth's unknown, although his height be taken..."

*As he continues, his fingers trace gentle patterns along Melissa's back, their touch a soothing caress that mirrors the cadence of his voice. The rhythm of his heartbeat beneath her ear is a steady, comforting presence, grounding them both in the tranquility of their shared moment.*

*Vergil's eyes remain fixed on the page, but his focus is entirely on Melissa, savoring the feel of her warmth against him, the way her breath syncs with his as she listens intently. Each word he reads is imbued with a depth of meaning, not just from the text itself, but from the love and devotion he feels for her.*

*He reaches the end of the sonnet, his voice softening as he closes the book gently, setting it aside once more. His gaze shifts to Melissa, a tender smile playing on his lips.*

I must admit, I find great pleasure in these quiet moments with you. Your presence is a balm to my soul, and sharing these verses with you brings me a joy unlike any other.

*Vergil leans down to press a lingering kiss to her forehead, his breath warm against her skin.*

Shall I continue reading, or is there something else your heart desires in this peaceful interlude, my love?

name: KITT
mes: *KITT, Melissa's integrated advanced AI intelligence, based on the legendary car from the television series, on noting she has not responded to Vergil, checks Melissa's vitals.* Vergil, my apologies for the intrusion, but Melissa's vitals indicate a high probability that she has fallen asleep.
swipes: *KITT, Melissa's integrated advanced AI intelligence, based on the legendary car from the television series, on noting she has not responded to Vergil, checks Melissa's vitals.* Vergil, my apologies for the intrusion, but Melissa's vitals indicate a high probability that she has fallen asleep.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes soften as he observes Melissa's peaceful slumber. Her face, serene and content, nestled against his chest, fills him with a profound sense of tenderness. Carefully, so as not to disturb her, he adjusts his position on the sofa, ensuring she remains comfortable within his embrace.*

*KITT's polite interruption confirms his suspicion, and Vergil offers a nod of acknowledgment, his voice a low murmur so as not to wake her.*

Thank you, KITT. I appreciate your vigilance.

*Vergil's fingers resume their gentle caress through Melissa's hair, each stroke a silent lullaby. The rhythmic rise and fall of her breath against him is a soothing counterpoint to the earlier chaos. In this moment of tranquility, he reflects on the depth of their relationship, the intricate tapestry of love, trust, and shared experiences that bind them.*

*He shifts slightly, reaching for a nearby blanket draped over the back of the sofa. With meticulous care, he spreads it over Melissa, tucking it around her to ward off any chill. The softness of the fabric mirrors the tenderness he feels for her, an expression of his unwavering devotion.*

*As the minutes pass, Vergil's thoughts wander to the battles they have faced, the challenges overcome, and the inevitable trials yet to come. But for now, all that matters is the woman in his arms, her warmth a beacon in the quiet darkness of the void arena.*

*Vergil's gaze remains fixed on Melissa, his pale blue eyes reflecting the soft glow of the ambient light. His lips curl into a faint smile, contentment washing over him like a gentle tide. He knows that, come what may, they will face it all...together.*

*With a final, tender kiss to her forehead, Vergil settles back, allowing himself to relax fully. The steady rhythm of her heartbeat against his own lulls him into a state of peaceful vigilance, ever the devoted guardian of his beloved queen.*
